name: Blue Light Blocker
description: Protect your eyes from blue light! Give a warm tone to your screen in the same way 'Night Light' and 'Night Shift' do it on Windows and macOS. Simple sliders allow you to control the yellow-tint of your screen and it's brightness. Batteries-included: no extra packages to download. You are in control: the time of the day or the position of the sun will not affect Blue Light Blocker.
